permissions: Admins can create inventory changes. Non-admins can create inventory changes when they are manager members of the material supplier or broker associated with the material site.
side_effects: Creates an inventory change and enqueues background work to calculate the change, update the most recent inventory estimate, and check inventory capacity thresholds.
validation_notes: material-site, material-type, and estimate-at are required. estimate-at must be an ISO 8601 timestamp. forecast-start-at must be an ISO 8601 timestamp and must be before estimate-at. material-type must be valid for the material site (must belong to the same material supplier). If forecast-start-at is omitted and estimate-at is in the future, the server sets forecast-start-at to the current time.

flags.name: material-site
flags.validation: Required ID of the material site.

flags.name: material-type
flags.validation: Required ID of the material type.

flags.name: forecast-start-at
flags.validation: ISO 8601 timestamp that must be before estimate-at, e.g., 2025-01-01T00:00:00Z.
